price: 25 Ce Jour-là, le ciel se déchirera pour laisser apparaître les nuages et les anges seront envoyés des cieux.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِٱلۡغَمَٰمِ وَنُزِّلَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ تَنزِيلًا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wayawma tashaqqaqu al-samāu bil-ghamāmi wanuzzila al-malāikatu tanzīlan
